info.title: Seegene Bid Information MCP Server
info.description: 씨젠을 위한 글로벌 입찰 정보 수집 및 분석 시스템

get.description: 지원 대상 조달 사이트의 크롤링 및 법적 유의사항 목록을 반환합니다.
특정 조달 사이트의 크롤링 가이드라인을 조회합니다.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of bids to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of bids to skip before starting to collect the result set.

parameters.name: site
parameters.description: Filter bids by the originating procurement site name.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter bids by the ISO country code of the opportunity.

parameters.name: min_relevance
parameters.description: Return only bids with a relevance score greater than or equal to this value.

get.description: HTTP endpoint that exposes available MCP tools for Smithery UI.

schema.title: Response List Mcp Tools Endpoint Mcp Tools Get

get.description: HTTP endpoint to fetch a single MCP tool definition.

schema.title: Response Get Mcp Tool Details Mcp Tools  Tool Name  Get

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: 검색할 키워드 목록. 기본값은 설정된 씨젠 키워드 사용

cron_expression.title: Cron Expression
cron_expression.description: 크론 표현식 (분 시 일 월 요일)

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: 연산자 (eq, ne, gt, lt, gte, lte, in, not_in, contains, starts_with, ends_with)

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique identifier for the site entry

country.title: Country
country.description: Country name or code for the site

site_name.title: Site Name
site_name.description: Official name of the procurement platform

base_urls.title: Base Urls
base_urls.description: Relevant base URLs for the platform

robots_txt_url.title: Robots Txt Url
robots_txt_url.description: Direct URL to the robots.txt file if known

robots_notes.title: Robots Notes
robots_notes.description: Summary of the robots.txt availability or findings

crawling_constraints.title: Crawling Constraints
crawling_constraints.description: Practical considerations or limitations when crawling the site

legal_notes.title: Legal Notes
legal_notes.description: Copyright or legal reuse considerations for collected materials

last_reviewed.title: Last Reviewed
last_reviewed.description: Timestamp when the information was last reviewed

SiteComplianceDetails.title: SiteComplianceDetails
SiteComplianceDetails.description: Represents compliance and crawling guidance for a procurement site.

SiteComplianceListResponse.title: SiteComplianceListResponse
SiteComplianceListResponse.description: Response model containing a collection of site compliance entries.

data.description: Compliance entry for the requested site

SiteComplianceResponse.title: SiteComplianceResponse
SiteComplianceResponse.description: Response model returning a single site compliance entry.
